mapper.select: select user.image,user.nickName,user_detail.realName,user_detail.email,user.telephone,user_detail.addressDesc,user_detail.descr from user LEFT JOIN user_detail ON user.Id = user_detail.id where user.Id = #{id}
select user_task.desc,user_task.status,user_task.finishTime from user_skill LEFT JOIN user_task ON user_skill.userId = user_task.workerId where user_skill.userId = #{userId}
